author: The Hitlist Team
title: 'Jolly LLB 3' confirmed, say makers
text:
Akshay Kumar. Pic/Rane Ashish 
Overwhelmed by the success of Jolly LLB 2, makers of the Akshay Kumar-starrer are now planning to come up with the third part of the hit franchise.
Producer Vijay Singh, CEO of Fox Star Studios, which helmed the sequel, said, "Yes, there will definitely be (a) Jolly LLB 3. We are in the second week of release. So, we are yet to sit down and work (on the third part). We have two-three ideas. Let's see what we pick up." The Subhash Kapoor - directed project initially featured Arshad Warsi in the lead, with Akki stepping in for part 2.
Asked if they plan to get a bigger star for the third instalment, Vijay said, "The details are yet to be finalised. But there will be a star."
